scripts.zip-extension: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const archiver = require('archiver'); const output = fs.createWriteStream('extension.zip'); const archive = archiver('zip', { zlib: { level: 9 } }); output.on('close', () => console.log('Pronto! extension.zip criado com sucesso. Clique com o bot√£o direito para baixar.')); archive.pipe(output); archive.directory('public/extension/', false); archive.finalize();"
